text: To make a Coke Kiln, you follow the approximate steps of creating a Charcoal Pit
To make a Coke Kiln, you will need to make the walls from refractory materials like Bricks or Nether Bricks
(A full list can be found under 'Valid Coke Kiln Materials')
Cover it and leave a spot for ignition.
Light it on fire then cover it quickly.
While processing it will emit smoke particles
After it stops emitting smoke it's done
Dig it up with a shovel. Fortune helps
You will get coal coke and ash. With more coke that ash. Coke can smelt 16 items, as much as 2 coal.
Coke can be crafted into blocks
It can also be used in brewing. When added to speed potions...
It will make Coke Cola, an upgraded potion of speed. The one in the picture is a lv 2 (with glowstone)
